Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,916,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Rick Waits (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1985, off Orel Hershiser (LAD)...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 6/8/1985...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,935,714 through salary arbitration...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,935,714 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Atlanta on 8/4/1987...
Hit 3 homeruns against Atlanta, driving in 7 runs on 8/4/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/1987, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
9/16/1987: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $5,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 5/29/1988 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/7/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $1,800,000 per year...
